18 // Draws a configuration.
19 // Parameter painter the Qt painter object,
20 // q the configuration to paint.
21 // P1 the widget projection of the configuration.
22 void DubinsWidget::draw(QPainter& painter, const Config& q,
23  const QPoint& P1) {
24  static const QColor arrow_color(Qt::red);
25  const double theta = q.orientation();
26  // line definition
27  const Point& P = q.position() + Vector(theta) * 0.15;
28  const QPoint P2 = real2pixel(P);
29  // arrow head definition
30  QPolygon arrow_head(3); // arrow head contains 3 points
31  arrow_head.putPoints(0, 3, 0, 0, -4, 6, -4, -6); // set points
32  // rotate and translate the arrow head
33  QTransform rot_matrix; // by default, identity
34  rot_matrix.rotateRadians(-theta); // widget's Y axis is reversed
35  arrow_head = rot_matrix.map(arrow_head);
36  arrow_head.translate(P2);
37  // paint the line and the arrow head
38  painter.setPen(arrow_color);
39  painter.drawLine(P1, P2);
40  painter.setBrush(arrow_color);
41  painter.drawConvexPolygon(arrow_head);
42 } // end of void DubinsWidget::draw(QPainter&, const Config&) --------
43 
44 // Reacts to a mouse move, according to the current step.
45 // Parameter event the mouse event.
46 void DubinsWidget::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
47  if ( (step == setStartOri) || (step == setEndOri) )
48  { mouse_pt = event->pos(); update(); event->accept(); }
49 } // end of void QtDubinsCheck::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent*) ---------
50 
51 // Reacts to a mouse click, according to the current step
52 // (which generaly changes).
53 // Parameter event the mouse event.
54 void DubinsWidget::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
55  static const int limit = 20;
56  QPoint diff;
57  Point pt;
58  double theta;
59  mouse_pt = event->pos();
60  if (step == selectCfg) { // end configuration first
61  diff = mouse_pt; diff -= end_pt;
62  if (diff.manhattanLength() <= limit)
63  step = setEndPos;
64  else { // start configuration second
65  diff = mouse_pt; diff -= start_pt;
66  if (diff.manhattanLength() <= limit)
67  step = setStartPos;
68  }
69  } else if (step == setStartPos) {
70  start_pt = mouse_pt; step = setStartOri;
71  } else if (step == setEndPos) {
72  end_pt = mouse_pt; step = setEndOri;
73  } else if (step == setStartOri) {
74  pt = pixel2real(start_pt);
75  theta = (pixel2real(mouse_pt) - pt).orientation();
76  start = Config(pt, theta);
77  path.connect(start, end);
78  step = selectCfg;
79  } else if (step == setEndOri) {
80  pt = pixel2real(end_pt);
81  theta = (pixel2real(mouse_pt) - pt).orientation();
82  end = Config(pt, theta);
83  path.connect(start, end);
84  step = selectCfg;
85  }
86  event->accept();
87  update();
88 } // end of void QtDubinsCheck::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent*) --------
89 
90 // Draws a part of the widget. Parameter event the paint event.
91 void DubinsWidget::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event) {
92  QPainter painter(this);
93  const bool nso = (step != setStartOri), neo = (step != setEndOri);
94  if (step == init) {
95  start_pt = real2pixel( start.position() );
96  end_pt = real2pixel( end.position() );
97  step = selectCfg;
98  }
99  if (nso) draw(painter, start, start_pt);
100  else {
101  painter.setPen(Qt::black);
102  painter.drawLine(start_pt, mouse_pt);
103  }
104  if (neo) draw(painter, end, end_pt);
105  else {
106  painter.setPen(Qt::black);
107  painter.drawLine(end_pt, mouse_pt);
108  }
109  if (nso && neo) {
110  painter.setPen(Qt::blue);
111  const DubinsPath::Type type = path.type();
112  const double radius = 1. / path.maxCurv();
113  double arc_length = 0, next_arc_length;
114  Config arc_start = path.start(), arc_end;
115  for(int idx = 0; idx < path.nbArcs;
116  idx++, arc_length = next_arc_length, arc_start = arc_end) {
117  const double l = path.arcLength(idx);
118  next_arc_length = arc_length + l;
119  arc_end = path[next_arc_length]; // circular arc or segment ?
120  if ( (type == path.lrl) || (type == path.rlr) || (idx != 1) ) {
121  const Point &center = path.turnCenter(idx),
122  &P1 = arc_start.position();
123  const QPoint ul_corner = // y axis inverted
124  real2pixel( center + Vector(-radius, radius) );
125  const double th1 = (P1 - center).orientation(),
126  angle = path.turnSign(type, idx) * l / radius,
127  diameter = 2 * radius * scale; /*
128  std::cout << "Arc of center " << center << ", from "
129  << Object::grad2deg(th1) << "° for "
130  << Object::grad2deg(angle) << "°" << std::endl; */
131  painter.drawArc( ul_corner.x(), ul_corner.y(),
132  diameter, diameter, Object::grad2deg(th1)
133  * 16, Object::grad2deg(angle) * 16 );
134  } else
135  painter.drawLine( real2pixel( arc_start.position() ),
136  real2pixel( arc_end.position() ) );
137  } // end of for (each arc)
138  } // end of if (drawing the path)
139  event->accept();
140 } // end of void QtDubinsCheck::paintEvent(QPaintEvent*) -------------
141 
142 // Asks for the maximum curvature, and adds the corresponding
143 // DubinsWindow into the window.
144 void DubinsWindow::update() {
145  const double max_curv =
146  QInputDialog::getDouble(this, "Maximum Curvature Definition",
147  "Enter Dubins' paths maximum curvature:",
148  1., 0.);
149  hide(); // hide the main window
150  // delete the old central widget
151  QWidget *oldWidget = centralWidget();
152  // add Dubins' paths widget as main widget
153  setCentralWidget( new DubinsWidget(*this, max_curv) );
154  show(); // show the main window
155  // delete the old central widget
156  oldWidget->deleteLater();
157 } // end of void DubinsWindow::update() ------------------------------
158 
159 // The DubinsWindow begins with only a start button.
160 DubinsWindow::DubinsWindow() : QMainWindow() {
161  setWindowTitle("Dubins' Paths Computation Verification");
162  QPushButton* initButton = new QPushButton( tr("Start") );
163  setCentralWidget(initButton);
164  connect( initButton, SIGNAL( clicked() ),
165  this, SLOT( update() ) );
166  show();
167 } // end of DubinsWindow::DubinsWindow() -----------------------------

180 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
181  QApplication app(argc, argv); // start the Qt main loop
182  DubinsWindow wndw; // create the Dubins' test window
183  // stop the Qt main loop when last window (= main window) is closed
184  app.connect( &app, SIGNAL( lastWindowClosed() ),
185  &app, SLOT( quit() ) );
186  return app.exec(); // return Qt main loop's return value
187 } // end of int main(int, char**) ------------------------------------
